name: Incompatible Species Episode 1: Unskippable Tutorial
description:
At a time when things are looking up for the world, there's always some grime aiming to take the good away. In this case, it's these mutating pests called "genofils", and it takes a crew of Exterminators to handle them.

Of course, even they have to take a moment to remember the risks involved as the leader of the group, Lucius, takes it upon himself to re-educate his subordinates partners.

This is a standalone release for the first episode of Incompatible Species: Unskippable Tutorial. You can find the full compilation of releases up to now here: https://poxnixles.itch.io/incomspe
